programme.title: Play To Win
programme.sub-title: Play To Win- Episode 4
programme.desc: Getting attention for yourself or for a product is one of the most difficult things you will ever be faced with. We devised a unique marketing challenge unlike any of the previous episodes.

programme.sub-title: How to Live and Lead with Kindness With Robert Clancy
programme.desc: Robert shares the chain of events that inspired him to devote his life to volunteerism and how this can bring deeper meaning to your life and soul too.

programme.desc: Thousands applied. 40 of the best people were picked and 8 people earned the right to compete for the Grand Prize. Which ONE of them actually Plays to WIN?

programme.title: Sex Talk
programme.sub-title: Sex Talk - How Aging Couples Can Keep Having Great Sex
programme.desc: Does sunshine increase desire? Plus, can couples really keep the spark alive as they age? All this and more on Sex Talk with Dr. Lia.

programme.title: Sex Talk
programme.sub-title: Sex Talk - The Secrets of Great Kissers
programme.desc: Want to know the secrets of great kissers? And we’ll show you what exercise seniors can do to improve their sex lives. Plus dealing with the emotions during a divorce.

programme.title: Sex Talk
programme.sub-title: Sex Talk - The Science of Falling in Love
programme.desc: The science of falling in love, plus putting the spark back into your sex life. Also, there are some health benefits to “going commando” but there are some things you always must keep in mind.

programme.title: The Rising Man Podcast
programme.sub-title: Drop The NEED To Control with Kari & Jeddy Azuma
programme.desc: Kari Azuma is a badass leader who guides women in rites of passage journeys and supports new mothers. We address how to navigate periods of low sexual connection, why perpetual overwhelm will create problems, and how to reach shared agreements.

programme.title: The Rising Man Podcast
programme.sub-title: Own It When You Can’t Hold It with Shems Heartwell & Jeddy Azuma
programme.desc: Shems Heartwell is a qi gong practitioner, acupuncturist, land steward, and men’s work leader. We hit on the areas that men struggle with most including the lone wolf mentality, habitual excuse making, and emotional suppression via substance abuse.

programme.title: The Mindsetters
programme.sub-title: Guest Maria Baez
programme.desc: Actress and Model Maria Baez shares how a violent attack lead her to creating her own beauty line to help accident and burn victims

programme.title: The Mindsetters
programme.sub-title: Guests Shannon Miller, Nicole, and Lipstick Ladies Part 1
programme.desc: Coach Lorraine Lindsey talks with the ladies about overcoming insecurities as women in business

programme.title: The Mindsetters
programme.sub-title: Guest Lipstick Ladies Part 2
programme.desc: Coach Lorraine Lindsey talks to reoccurring guest the Lipstick Ladies Carmen Smith and Sharlene Ruiz about their personal insecurities

programme.title: Dr. Q&A
programme.sub-title: Dr. Q&A - Gastro
programme.desc: Stomach aches and pains are a common complaint. Here are the signs that the problem could be serious.

programme.title: Dr. Q&A
programme.sub-title: Dr. Q&A - Back Pain
programme.desc: Back pain is one of the most common conditions today but there are treatments, exercises, and therapies that can relieve the pain that don’t involve either narcotics or surgery. But if those interventions are needed you want to make sure you have what you need to make an informed decision

programme.title: Dr. Q&A
programme.sub-title: Dr. Q&A - Alzheimer's Disease: Hope For The Future
programme.desc: Alzheimer’s disease affects millions of people around the world, robbing them of their memory and of so much of their lives. There is still no sure but there are some treatments and active clinical trials that are offering promise. In this program, we discuss some of the lifestyle changes people can make to help prevent or at least slow down the progression of Alzheimer’s and stay as mentally healthy as possible.

programme.title: Dr. Q&A
programme.sub-title: Dr. Q&A - A Plastic Surgeon Answers Your Questions
programme.desc: Think you need a little nip or tuck? Want answers about fillers or Botox? Need advice about hair loss ? Our expert talks about all that and much more. Plus he highlights a new procedure that can help people who have had suffered traumatic injuries to their limbs.

programme.title: Dr. Q&A
programme.sub-title: Dr. Q&A - The Truth About Prostate Cancer
programme.desc: Prostate cancer is the most common cancer in men. But there is a great deal of misinformation about treatments, causes and even screening. Find out the truth from the expert in this program.

programme.title: OmStars- Yoga Is Series
programme.sub-title: Yoga Is - Day 13 Patience Marichasana C
programme.desc: Day 13 of our challenge brings us an opportunity to understand patience through the twisting posture Marichasana C.

programme.title: OmStars- Yoga Is Series
programme.sub-title: Yoga Is - Day 14 Joy Happy Baby
programme.desc: For day 14 we’ll use Happy Baby pose to explore what yoga truly is.

programme.title: OmStars- Yoga Is Series
programme.sub-title: Yoga Is - Day 15 Mindfulness Trikonasana A
programme.desc: Today we go deeper into understanding what yoga is as we explore mindfulness and the pose Trikonasana.

programme.title: Good Morning Joy
programme.sub-title: Good Morning Joy - Practical Spirituality with Dr. Joe Vitale
programme.desc: Shari chats with Dr. Joe Vitale, bestselling author and spiritual teacher, about practical spirituality, conquering inner saboteurs, and his book Zero Limits Living. Plus, a joyful face-off challenge!

programme.title: Good Morning Joy
programme.sub-title: Good Morning Joy - How to Be Brave with Laura Di Franco
programme.desc: Laura di Franco, founder of Brave Healer Productions, shares her vision for Brave Healer and the power of authentic messages. Plus, authors Angel Rohrer and Carolyne McGee discuss bravery, spirituality, and their books.

programme.title: The Aware Show
programme.sub-title: The Aware Show - Reframing Loneliness
programme.desc: Today Lisa speaks with Udo Erasmus, best-selling author of “Fats that Heal, Fats that Kill.” As an expert in health and healing, he talks about the true meaning behind loneliness and ways to reconnect to the self and live a life of thriving!

programme.title: The Aware Show
programme.sub-title: The Aware Show - Manifesting Your Desires
programme.desc: Today Lisa talks with best-selling author and coach Christy Whitman about how to manifest your dreams. Her upcoming book is “The Desire Factor: How to Embrace Your Materialistic Nature to Reclaim Your Full Spiritual Power.” Christy shares proven methods for bringing your desires into your life. Info: christywhitman.com.

programme.title: The Aware Show
programme.sub-title: The Aware Show - The Beauty in Grief
programme.desc: Can one truly understand loss? Senior Rabbi Steve Leder has presided over thousands of funerals, but it was the death of his own father that initiated a deeper understanding of grief. Today he discusses how the “moments” matter most. His new book is The Beauty of What Remains. Info: steveleder.com.

programme.title: Pull Up The Curtain with G Souldier
programme.sub-title: Pull Up The Curtain - Ethel Love
programme.desc: An In-Depth interview with Ethel Love. Talks 2Pac, Brenda’s Got a Baby Music Video Shoot, and Her Life

programme.title: The Rico No Suave Talk Show
programme.sub-title: The Rico No Suave Talk Show - Chuck Johnson
programme.desc: The Actor, Stuntman and Motion Capture Artist Chuck Johnson! Get to know Chuck Johnson tuning in from Tokyo, Japan, Learn about Martial Arts, Learn from Chuck about his passion of teaching people the art of wanting to be in a movie. You will learn alot in this interview!

programme.desc: Dive into the fundamentals of yoga with this sequence that builds up to downward facing dog.

programme.title: Get Your Yoga On Series

programme.desc: Join Kino for a short, gentle practice that is centered around core engagement and the plank pose

programme.title: Meditations for Manifestation
